description.value:
Cold

Aura 3

: an enemy that enters or starts its turn within the aura gains vulnerable 10 cold. While the Prince of Frost is bloodied, this increases to vulnerable 15 cold.

Basic Attack

At-Will ✦ Weapon

Standard

+36 vs AC; 2d8+9 damage plus 2d8 cold damage, and the target takes a -2 penalty to all defenses until the end of the Prince of Frost's next turn.

Basic Attack

At-Will ✦ Cold

Standard

Ranged 10

+34 vs Fortitude; 2d10+10 cold damage, and ongoing 10 cold damage, and the target is immobilized until the end of the Prince of Frost's next turn.

At-Will ✦ Cold, Weapon

Standard

The Prince of Frost makes a melee basic attack against two different targets. While bloodied, he can target three creatures

Encounter ✦ Cold

Standard

Ranged 10

+34 vs Fortitude; 1d10+11 cold damage, and the target is slowed and is dazed (save ends both). First Failed Saving Throw: The target takes 15 cold damage and is stunned (save ends). Second Failed Saving Throw: The target turns to ice and is petrified (save ends).

At-Will ✦ Charm, Cold

Minor 1/Round, At-Will

Ranged 10

Targets a creature taking ongoing cold damage; +32 vs Will; the target no longer takes ongoing cold damage and is dominated until the end of the Prince's next turn. Aftereffect: The target is slowed (save ends).

Cold

Minor, Recharges When No Enemy Is Affected By This Power

Ranged 20

Trigger: When no enemy is affected by this power

+34 vs Reflex; 3d10+11 cold damage, and ongoing 10 cold damage and the target is immobilized (save ends both). Aftereffect: Ongoing 5 cold damage, and the target is slowed (save ends both).

system.rechargeCondition: When No Enemy Is Affected By This Power

description.value:
Teleportation

Immediate Reaction

Trigger: When an enemy within 10 squares makes an attack with the fire keyword

The Prince of Frost teleports 10 squares and makes a basic attack against the triggering target. If the prince hits, the target is also dazed (save ends).

Recharge 5-6 ✦ Teleportation

Move

The Prince of Frost teleports 5 squares. Each enemy adjacent to the square that he leaves takes 5 cold damage and is slowed until the end of the prince's next turn.

system.biography:
HP 1124; Bloodied 562
Resist 30 cold, 20 radiant Vulnerable 15 fire 		Init +25 | AP 2 | Save +5 (+10 against charm effects)
AC 45Fort 42Ref 43Will 44
Speed 8 (ice walk)
Ability ScoresStr 28 (+24)
Con 25 (+22)		Dex 30 (+25)
Int 25 (+22)		Wis 25 (+22)
Cha 33 (+26)
Languages Common, Draconic, Elven, Giant, Primordial
Alignment Evil
Skills Arcana +27, Diplomacy +31, Insight +27, Intimidate +31Senses Low-light vision
Passive Perception 32 | Insight 37
